page.title: 03CUSTOMS EDUCATION
page.content: {CUSTOMS}in North Leverton are typical of the country. Christmas parties Easter eggs, summer holidays. Garden Parties, Feast, Field Days, are money raisers when stalls, side shows and games are used. Sport Days, are held on the school field and Swimming Sports at the Retford Sports centre. {EDUCATION}North Leverton School is modern,for Children of Junior age (5_ 11) with 142 Children on roll. A play School takes children from 3 years. At 11 years children go to Retford King Edward school and then Worksop for 16+ education. Adult classes are held in basketry, pottery, aerobics Flower arranging and dressmaking. The building is used for events, meetings and clubs.
